alert.note: Alert for Griggs; Nelson; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nelson, Griggs and northwestern Steele Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sutton, or 37 miles northwest of Valley City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sutton and Revere around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Jessie, Binford, Kloten and Aneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
